## Description

This is a simple GraphQL Node server for movies that uses Apollo and Express. It is based off of [Ben Awad's tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WhzIjYQmWvs&t=2s), but slight changes were made based on my coding style.

### Motivation

I wanted to dive into GraphQL and also practice TypeScript and I found this to be a simple but deep dive into TypeORM, Type-GraphQL, and Apollo.

## Next Steps

I hope to expand this to include more entities and more mutations. I also hope to expand this to a project where I am recieving the queries and mutations from a React frontend.
